title: CS Competency Strengthening: Strategies to Alleviate EFL Learning Anxiety for Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three anxiety factors occurring in English learning contexts.
Learners design and implement at least two learning engagement strategies utilizing teacher support behaviors.
Learners apply English learning strategies for cognitive/affective anxiety reduction (e.g., note-taking, self-assessment) at least three times and record outcomes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
